website_summaries.verdict: Whether you want a lasting memorial to your cat or dog that has crossed the Rainbow Bridge for your bookshelf, or to mark the grave, this pet angel sculpture is sure to invoke those special memories.
pros: Beautiful figure in choice of cat or dog with angel wings for a touching tribute
Constructed of stone-bonded resin for durability – can be used outside as a grave marker or as a memorial in a garden
cons: Some reports of flaws in the design
A few owners wish it were a bit larger and heavier, though at around 2 pounds it's likely to stay where you put it

customer_reviews.title: A Gorgeous item In Loving Memory
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I imagined! The details are amazing. My cat was more like my son. He passed away a few days ago from cancer and I cannot believe how gorgeous this piece is... it brings me to tears and this angel memorial does his memory justice. Very Fast shipping. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: QueenGueneviereRevamped

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing and much lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my garden as a memorial to my 18 year old cat who I just lost. She loved to sit in her garden. The reviews looked great and it is described as a “resin/stone” blend. I received it today - if there is any stone in this resin, it must just be a bit of dust. There is not much weight to this for the size and description (22 oz.); it really feels like it’s a plastic cast. The paint job is very splotchy as well, odd dark areas, especially on the tail.
customer_reviews.author: domanii

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but managable
customer_reviews.text: When my aunts cat passed away I purchased this to custom paint so it looked like her departed kitty. The statue is easy to paint, however there was parts of the wings that were chipped off either due to shipping or just from the piece being fragile. I was able to repair chipped pieces with clay. Also, you can tell where the wings are connected as a separate piece, so I added clay to the back side and textured it to look like fur so it blended more with the wings. Statue does hold up at the same temperature as Fimo clay, just keep an eye on it if you use this method; or use air dry clay.
customer_reviews.author: Kodaki

customer_reviews.title: Angel kitty
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot express how sweet this statue is for memorializing a lost pet kitty. It is quite petite and was ideal for our adult cat who remained small forever due to Feline Leukemia. She was healthy and lived 5 1/2 years until she got sick, far surpassing the predicted 6 months; a precious and unique cat who deserved a special stone as a grave marker. Design Toscano created the perfect marker for a small cat. We attached it to a decorative stone base and coated it with a protectant against the harsh Minnesota winters. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Pyewacket

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My beautiful cat, Angel, died in March and I wanted a marker for her grave. This one seemed perfect and was reasonably priced. It was a bit smaller than I anticipated and is made of resin whereas I would have preferred stone. Having said this, I am still very pleased with it and would recommend it to anyone who loves cats and wants to remember that special kitty who is no longer with you.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelsma

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Quality - Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for family that lost a cat they had had for 15 years I was very disappointed to find out that what they unboxed was cracked in two places and felt as though it was hollow. (Which is the only reason it got 3 stars for "light weight") It also has several patchy spots that looks like a coating has worn off. Extremly disappointed and with this being given as a gift returning this item is not really an option. I would like my money back but cannot find an option to contact the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a memorial for my cat we had to put down. It's a beautiful lovely piece. Not heavy at all. We set it outside over his grave and it has held up well with the torrential rains and summer heat and high winds. The detail is beautiful and it's a wonderful memorial piece. I would highly suggest this as a memorial statue.
customer_reviews.author: Leria DravenTop Contributor: Beauty and the Beast

customer_reviews.title: A Pretty Memorial
customer_reviews.text: Our two Maine Coon cats died within six months of one another. The second one was running and jumping up until the minute he passed away. We were heartbroken. We buried them both in our garden and grieved. When I got the little statue, I painted it with acrylic paints and then coated it with polyethylene. That isn't necessary, but I have a lot of painted signs in the garden identifying trees and plants. It looks very nice. We have always had cats and loved each one. This is the sweetest memorial of all.
customer_reviews.author: Painterjayne

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT GIFT FOR SOMEONE THAT LOSS THEIR BELOVED FUR BABY
customer_reviews.text: On August 12th my 12 year old cat crossed the rainbow bridge, she left on her terms. My heart hurts and her sweet campion is lost without her "sister" I was thinking of something I could get in Memory of her, and this cute statue showed up and I knew I had to buy it. Just the perfect size to have it next to her photo. If it was bigger I would have placed it by her final resting place.
customer_reviews.author: Letitia (Tisha) Gagnon Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: We had a cat who was very special and got one to put on his grave. Quite heavy for the size so it appears to be solid rather than hollow. It won't blow off or be disturbed by rain and it is very detailed and attractive. The instructions say it's weather proof but that they don't hold up well in freezing conditions so it's probably a good idea to take them in for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Goat_Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the one in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Got the medium size loving friend. I first saw this about 3 weeks ago, but kept waiting to order it. The one in the picture looks soooooo much like my Broady Broad that i wanted it as soon as i seen it. But i didnt think the one that would ship to me would look like the pictured one, in which case it would be of no good use to me. It showed up today and it looks exactly like the one shown. While unpackaging it i really didnt expect to be as pleased with it as i am. I could not be happier with this. Its perfect. Its the center piece now of her memorial.
customer_reviews.author: Dale "JR!"

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in memory of my kitty who recently passed away. I'm very pleased. I plan to paint it to look like him, and the surface feels like it will take the paint well. You can see where the wings have been attached as an extra piece to the body, and I included a photo of that specifically, but I don't feel it detracts from how nice the cat it. Mine will be used inside, but I'm not sure how well it would do outdoors. It's not very heavy. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rmdev

customer_reviews.title: cute but small
customer_reviews.text: It is a very cute memorial for our beloved kitty. I just wish I'd gotten the bigger one. Still cute though.
customer_reviews.author: That's Me!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.text: Very special, sweet piece. We placed this in the yard to commemorate the splendid life of our 20-year-old Maine Coon cat. He was such a beloved, kind companion and we miss him dearly each day. When we look outside and see this statue, it gives us a peaceful, restful feeling. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: moonscape

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memorial for my furkids
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful memorial marking my two beloved cats' burial site. Well made and detailed. I lost two senior cats within two years and recently buried their cremains together. They were best friends for life. I honored each with their own sleeping angel. Each sculpture looks like my oh-so-missed furkids!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Memorial for our dear cat
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought I would put this outside over my cat's grave but now I have decided to put it on our fireplace mantel where we will see it all the time we planted daisies over his grave
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burlingame

customer_reviews.title: Cat memorial
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute & nicely detailed. I was hoping it would have a little more weight to it though. I think it’s the perfect size and should go well in the area with decorative rocks. It’s hollow & can probably be filled with sand or cement to give it more weight. The bottom says made in China, but I don’t have a problem with it. It came quickly & would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: So adorable and meaningful
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect way to remember a furry loved one. We placed it where her food bowls used to be. Wonderful product. Made very well and just the right size. It has some weight to it. Well worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Lister

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cat angel
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised by how big it is! Very nice sculpture. Sturdy and well detailed. Great value . It was well packaged, thank you, looks great in my cat’s memorial garden.
customer_reviews.author: Little Gato

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece. It is not as light as some of the reviews suggest, I think people were just expecting it to be stone. It has some weight to it, I’m comfortable leaving it outside. It looks just like stone and the details are really amazing. Plus, it looks like my kitty. I put him in the spot he always laid by the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Heavy enough to feel sturdy without being dangerous for a glass display case, not gaudy, and the lack of paint allows one to imagine it to be whatever colour one's cat was. Mine guards my father's and my cat's cremation urns.
customer_reviews.author: Dae

customer_reviews.title: Great cat memorial
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cat memorial for a friend of the family. The details are very nice. I did not rate the sturdiness and presentation because it is resin, it seems strong but is any resin? Anyway, the product makes a very thoughtful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Shipped fast. I primer, painted and sealed it so it looks like my old kitty that passed away. Now Nana can stay in the garden and watch all the butterflies forever.
customer_reviews.author: Tomagain

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Little Memorial
customer_reviews.text: When my mom's cat passed away a few months ago from leukemia, I wanted a little something extra to place on his grave. It is rather lightweight and small, but so far it's been holding up well through many rain and thunderstorms. I feel like the letters might fade, but those would be easy enough to repaint. Definitely recommend if you want something simple to remember your kitty by. Perfect for a small grave, in the garden/yard, or to place inside.
customer_reviews.author: K.O.

customer_reviews.title: nice statue, good price
customer_reviews.text: got this to place on top of where i buried my pet when she passed away. it looks very nice, its not heavy or thick, its a bit fragile but as long as its not in danger of kids playing or something falling on top you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: darizo99

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Received it quickly and in good condition. The figure was very cute looking and was what I've been looking for. The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 is only because of cautions about outdoor use in with freezing temperature. I wish those cautions were in the description. But I really like it and would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Perfict!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a sweet kitty! I lost my cat of 18.5 years on Wednesday night and this is the perfect statue for her resting place. I've never have received a package with such amazing secure packaging. Thank you so much for the wonderful mamorial kitty
customer_reviews.author: ashley warberg

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Although this is lovely, it is way too small! It was purchased to be placed next to the graves of two of my kitties. IT was listed with outdoor statuettes..and is so small you can't see it in the garden
customer_reviews.author: Sybil E.

customer_reviews.title: It's Beautiful, Attention Getter,  many Compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, Adds to your Garden. I love looking at it. Bought, one for a gift. My neighbors lost their beloved Cat, and they just loved it. A memorial for their beloved kitty cat. And one me.
customer_reviews.author: D.G.

customer_reviews.title: Sad & Happy
customer_reviews.text: My Monet (cat) just passed, wanted to get something. I seen this memorial cat statue and knew I had to have this. I love the detail work. And it's smile. You won't be disappointed if you order. Cause I am not
customer_reviews.author: deborah reagan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Runs on the small side, which is my fault for never paying attention to measurements. Very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy K. Peppas

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality. Cheap plasticy feeling. The paint inside the letters was also on the stone. Not worth the money paid for it. Many imperfections over the whole item.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tribute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our local library where community cats are found. One cat was ran over, and this memorial statue is a great addition to the outside garden area.
customer_reviews.author: BrandiP

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and well made
customer_reviews.text: This statue is sweet and well made. I bought it as a gift for a friend who had recently lost her kitty. I wish it was bigger. I would buy one for my garden where I have a loved cat buried after it passed. The size is great for a mantle or other inside use.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and reminded me of our cat who just passed on. Heavier than I thought, so not too worried about if tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: SuessC

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: First off - I love Toscano products. I've never been disappointed. I got this as a memorial to the cats I have & who have passed throughout the years. It's sweet & cheerful, well made & looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: K. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: An outside "memorial" for a long time friend
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as advertised. Well made and sturdy. Shipped with plenty of protection for the "wings". It is acting as a memorial for our deceased "Marina Cat" and I think it will hold up well in the outside garden.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully detailed memorial, absolutely precious!
customer_reviews.text: This memorial is just beautiful. It DOES have weight to it so I don't understand what the other customers are talking about. The detailing is lovely. Very pleased with this Cat Memorial. The packaging was outstanding. Nothing could break with two boxes packed with styrofoam. This will look great on my cat Oscar's grave.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is precious. The camp cat at our deer lease recently crossed over. She was loved by everyone and a great mouser. She is much missed and this will be a loving reminder to us of her sweet loving soul.
customer_reviews.author: thunderstar

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I intend on painting it before putting it outside as a memorial for kitties that passed on. It has good detail overall.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Thurstin

customer_reviews.title: Lasts Outside - Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: This lasted outside for two years in Florida. (We took it inside during the hurricane!) Today I found it smashed by someone on our front lawn ☹️ But it was still in great shape beforehand and it was a great memorial marker for our cat, Charley. I will buy another when I can spend $30 on a cat statue again.
customer_reviews.author: Casey McNicol

customer_reviews.title: A lovely grave marker for my little girl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this statue to mark the grave of my beloved kitty. It’s a very subtle but lovely statue. However, it is quite lightweight and if you leave it outside, it might get blown over by wind. Not a big deal at all for me, but may be worth noting to others. I’m sure it would be perfectly stable indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: cute but not too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this very sweet item for my "pet cemetery". while I knew it wasn't made of concrete,i still thought the resin would be heavier than it is.it is HOLLOW,and would blow away in one good storm.for now I am keeping it indoors.it was packaged very well to prevent breakage.this is cute but NOT worth the 35 bucks I paid,15 would be more like it.thanx.
customer_reviews.author: old chick

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift for a friend who lost their cat, they love it but I would have liked a little more weight to it since it was too lightweight to be outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Keiluja

customer_reviews.title: Memorial statue
customer_reviews.text: Product is precious for my beloved kitty that passed but was lighter like resin and smaller than I thought..
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very small in size. Was going to put outside but didn’t as I was afraid it might get lost. The pose and design were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: Very precious.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Perfect condition. Painted for my baby sister who lost her first cat. I was incredibly pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ALEXXANDRIA

customer_reviews.title: A tribute to my poor cat that was killed by my neighbor
customer_reviews.text: A tribute to my poor cat that was killed by my neighbor. I had to find a way to honor him. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M Hahn

customer_reviews.title: In Memory Of
customer_reviews.text: This little statue is the perfect addition to my kitty memorial garden. It was knocked over by the resident woodchuck and it survived. THAT pleased me!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy De Finis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product and sturdy, the only thing I didn’t like was You could really see where the wings were glued with whatever the clay looking type glue. Besides that it was great and is easily paintable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat Memorial Angel Statue
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put in my backyard for a memorial to my best pal. This Cat Memorial Angel Statue is nicer than expected. Nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to memorialize the many cats I’ve had and this was perfect. Well made, well packaged, and now in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: sarnah

customer_reviews.title: Good detailing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a giant piece of my heart that passed away. Looks like it will be a good memorial. Good detailing!
customer_reviews.author: kit Cobain

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of her and is a great comfort to me in my garden
customer_reviews.text: Bought this piece after the loss of a 5 month old kitten. Reminds me of her and is a great comfort to me in my garden.
customer_reviews.author: Coleen M. Shupe

customer_reviews.title: So Beautiful, it makes me want to cry
customer_reviews.text: If you have lost a beloved cat and want a memorial for it, this is the one. It's the most heart warming, lovely statue I've seen. So many are gaudy and overdone. This one is just right.
customer_reviews.author: TeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful, and we love it where our cats are buried! I even got another one for my sister-in-law.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Furtado

customer_reviews.title: aww!..
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in memory of my grand frend for 16 years, my companion , we travel to NY, NJ, TX, and she went so fast from me, in just 2 days, she leave me , now she is in a best place, and this lovely pet statue is adorable , and is on my garden . I recomend to everyone how love your cat and lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: ... one of these precious statues after I lost my wonderful cat. I have to tell you the detail ...
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased one of these precious statues after I lost my wonderful cat. I have to tell you the detail is incredible and it is beautiful. I was very impressed. I think you will be too. This company is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: leatherjax

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have one outside and one inside.. Both are done okay. We did seal the outside one with a clear coat for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but sweet
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a memorial gardenfor beloved lost cats. It's very nice but quite tiny. But it's weathered the seasons well as I keep it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: MJaremko

customer_reviews.title: Sad but great memorial
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and product was as described. Bought another one for her sister when we buried her a year later..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed... thank you very much for such great service...
customer_reviews.author: Sissy Louise

customer_reviews.title: It was the perfect size. Looks great in the garden
customer_reviews.text: It was the perfect size. Looks great in the garden. A little hidden reminder of a cat who enjoyed basking in the sun and lounging in the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: if you like cat gargoyles, this is fabulous. just as advertised. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: se.rowe

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small
customer_reviews.text: Our cat passed away and my child picked this out in memory. We got this in a great shipping box that had stryrofoam to keep in place and ensure it arrived in one piece
customer_reviews.author: Osbaldo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who lost her cat this year. She loved it and will put it in her garden this summer.
customer_reviews.author: ad

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: not for me but the individual who wanted it is pleased with it...AAA+...arrived quick and price point is more than adequate
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Cat angel statue
customer_reviews.text: A good memorial for our cat. A little light in weight, not sure about outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality- Arrived with one wing glued on!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with one wing glued on in a horrible fashion- tried to caulk ion for the funeral- very poor quality. It ruined the oversll effect of a beautiful headstone.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Knight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little piece.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our little girl’s memorial, and it personifies just the little pose she always made, with those big eyes and sweet smile. Its a perfect little size and looks so nice on the stones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: It was way too small for the grave marker I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sowl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Received this and it is literally about 4 inches tall. I would probably pay $5 for this tops due to quality and height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Memento
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years back after my cat passed away. We buried him outside where he roamed next to one of our other dear pets. I recently went to sit and spend a little time with him and noticed the statue we bought had held up amazingly. I think it was a rather fitting piece given he slept so much. Now I can only hope he's sleeping happily wherever he is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Lovely way to remember the good times
customer_reviews.text: While I say I love it, of course the reason for purchasing is still heartbreaking. But, this looks lovely in my little rock garden and gives me a place to sit quietly and remember the love she gave us.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put under my Christmas tree in honor of my 16year-old cat that passed. She spent every holiday season under the tree, and I felt it was the most appropriate memorial. I was not disappointed. This was a good weight and not very fragile. Looking forw6to pulling it out again this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful memorial statue for garden!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made memorial statue for my garden! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Capell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cat Angel!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I agree with the reviews here. The cat statue is even more beautiful in person than the picture. It is a perfect indoor or outdoor memorial statue for my beloved special cat. The detail is so lovely and it's afordable! What a wonderful comfort for a broken heart. Thanks to the artist!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Lady

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful tribute to my cat
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected, but all in all a beautiful grave marker for my Blackjack.
customer_reviews.author: RPB

customer_reviews.title: small little cat on the light weight side but perfect from my kitten as a memorial in our home ...
customer_reviews.text: small little cat on the light weight side but perfect from my kitten as a memorial in our home garden.
customer_reviews.author: ericajana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to memorialize my 10 year old cat who recently passed away.
customer_reviews.author: gatosmom

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cherished gift.
customer_reviews.text: What a sweet little sleeping kitty. I got it for my friend after her cat went to heaven. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mary white

customer_reviews.title: Happy, but with reservations
customer_reviews.text: Intended it for the garden, but it does not seem substantial enough to survive weather. Could be wrong, but we keep it inside, in a nice place. This works, too, and we are happy and satisfied. Seems a bit pricey, for what it is. It IS a very nice piece and it fills our need for a memorial piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Sweet statue
customer_reviews.text: I love this little statue. Looks just like my Gino that we lost way too soon. Every time I look at it reminds me that he is a beautiful angel now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rafferty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing detail! Looks very sweet next to my precious cat’s urn on my windowsill. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent memorial as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The perfect memorial for a loved kitty. The smile and wings bring happy tear on the days where I miss my buddy most
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Item came quickly and was well packed. Even better than the description. Can't help but smile every time I see it. Will order from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Jinaustin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Remembrance
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of my baby every day I miss him so just the right size fits on my table
customer_reviews.author: Sandra A Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this to mark my cat's grave in our garden and it's perfect. Small, nicely detailed, and so so sweet. It tucks in between her headstone and a flower planter and looks perfect. It's been through all kinds of storms already but still looks brand new, and stays surprisingly clean for its light color.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: so sweet!
customer_reviews.text: my "pet cemetery" is on the far end of the yard, so this guy will greet visitors on my porch after the snow is gone!
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: A sweet tribute
customer_reviews.text: It made a great memorial for our feline friend when he passed. The other cats sometimes go to inspect it thinking it is a new playmate, I have often imagined that they are stopping by to see their old pal.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Statue
customer_reviews.text: This statue caught my eye being it had the same body shape of Tiny, a kitty we recently lost. Since Tiny was my sister’s cat I was looking for something to get her to remember her kitty by and this was perfect. So I painted it and it really does look like her Tiny. It’s a good quality item and can be painted.
customer_reviews.author: Z.A.L. Storm

customer_reviews.title: What happened to Design Toscano quality???
customer_reviews.text: Design Toscano used to have quality items, but this looks like a dollar store statue, very light and cheaply made. Sad that a nice company had to cut the quality to stay in business.
customer_reviews.author: Janet H.

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for a friend .
customer_reviews.text: My good friend had to deal with the passing of her beloved cat "Buddy". She called me when it arrived at her house and was moved b y my gesture to memorialize her cat, She absolutely loved the "cat memorial angel pet statue" and placed it on Buddie's grave. I think it helped her with the grieving process she is dealing with. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Marcusmaximus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful angel
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this statue. My cat of 16 years past away and this is my ANGEL. It is very peaceful and comforting to me.
customer_reviews.author: Good Buy!!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful memorial for my baby girl. It stands beside her ashes.

customer_reviews.title: Memorial Statue
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the kitten that it is a marker for.

customer_reviews.title: Statue is smaller & lighter than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This statue is much smaller and lighter than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Precious memorial for a precious pet
customer_reviews.text: I recently lost my cat of 15 1/2 years, and I was looking for a sleeping cat to place in her favorite sleeping spot - and what could be better that a statue of an angel cat! We absolutely love this statue and and highly recommend it to anyone that is making a special remembrance garden for lost pets. This statue is made well with lots of details.
customer_reviews.author: L. Keeling

customer_reviews.title: nice small statue.
customer_reviews.text: great little statue looks nice inside . have not placed it outdoors .
customer_reviews.author: pure faith

product_meta.title: Design Toscano QL6080 Cat Angel Pet Memorial Grave Marker Tribute Statue, One Size, full color
product_meta.description: Style:Cat AngelWhen a lost pet tugs at the heartstrings, honor the memory of your beloved cat with this touching animal statue tribute. Our Design Toscano-exclusive angelic pet figurine is sculpted with a peaceful face and feathered wings, then is cast in quality designer resin as a guardian garden statue for a pet's final resting place or as a commemorative animal statue tribute in a spot of honor in your home. A thoughtful and healing gift! Another quality garden animal statue from Toscano! 10"Wx5½ "Dx5"H. 2 lbs.
feature_bullets: MEMORIAL CAT ANGEL STATUES - Honor the memory of a lost pet with our special tribute statues of peaceful sleeping cats depicted with feathered angel wings

THOUGHTFUL AND HEALING GIFT - Displayed as grave stones at a pet's final resting place or as commemorative animal statue tributes in a place of honor in their home, this sculpture is a welcome healing gift to loved ones
HIGH QUALITY FIGURINES - Hand-cast using real crushed stone bonded with durable designer resin, our cat angels memorials are topped with a UV resistant finish
DESIGN TOSCANO GRAVE MARKERS - Exclusive to the Design Toscano brand, this monument to your loyal feline makes a fitting animal angel statue tribute indoors, a garden gravestone, or lawn ornament
Our indoor/outdoor pet cat memorial sculpture measures 10"Wx5. 5"Dx5"H 2 lbs.
